pages.text: The Filter Module is a very versatile item that can be used to whitelist or blacklist items for the machine. Various machines support this module (Builder, Modular Storage, Crafter, ...)$(br2)Blocks, items, and tags are supported. You can blacklist or whilelist and also require mathing on NBT and damage

$(5)Sneak right click$() on an inventory (like a chest) to add all items/block in that inventory to the filter.$(br)$(5)Sneak right click$() on a block in the world to add that block to the filter.$(br2)In the GUI of the filter module you can also add tags or convert a block/item to the corresponding tags
